scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && yarn build" "cd server && yarn build"
scripts.clean: concurrently "rimraf node_modules yarn.lock" "cd client && rimraf node_modules build yarn.lock" "cd server && rimraf node_modules build yarn.lock"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && yarn start" "cd server && yarn start"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "cd client && yarn start" "cd server && yarn start:prod"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: concurrently "cd client/ && npm install && npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap && npm run build" "cd server/ && yarn && yarn build"
